description:
When Momoka becomes infected by an unknown virus, the government`s fearsome and secret National Survival Game Club moves to restrain her. Miou announces the Survival Game Club`s mission to throw a birthday party for Urara! While Momoka is normally cold to Urara, she decides she should at least be nice to her on this day and does her best to prepare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu, mes amis ! Le dernier jour du club Sabage - Chaleureusement, de la part du club
Farewell, Friends! The Last Day of the Survival Game Club! / With Love from the Survival Game Club
Saraba Tomo yo! Sabage Bu Saigo no Hi / Sabage Bu Yori Ai o Komete
さらば友よ! サバゲ部最後の日! / サバゲ部より愛を込めて
